channel.title: What we miss in Auxy ğŸ™!
channel.description:
As you all knew that Auxy is evolving and changing time to time to push the app boundaries into more serious music production software. As a result we have seen our fav. feature got removed for some reason. Now you all have to tell what were those features that you liked the most and that got removed
Keep in mind itâ€™s about features that Auxy used to have previously, No new features suggestion over here ğŸ‘ˆ

item.title: What we miss in Auxy ğŸ™!
item.dc:creator: icelight
item.description:
What we miss in Auxyâ€¦
I guess I miss the vibe and energy and excitement that the community had for the app early back in 2017 on the forum hereâ€¦

i am kind of angry to see it dashed by the devs like it has been and the disdain displayed for the community noticeably right now â€” promising revolution in music-making, no less, remember, and people really got behind it â€” but I often felt like the devs were kind of dismissive for a long while anyway, initially of peopleâ€™s various suggestions (saying things werenâ€™t needed like different time signatures, haha, and so on) and then from a prolonged absence and lack of communication around that and even being kind of dismissive about peopleâ€™s expectations around having that because theyâ€™re subscribing, etc. Then including the total lack of presence now.

Read full topic
item.source: What we miss in Auxy ğŸ™!
